name: Abductive Non-Compliance Diagnosis
description: Infer likely missing control based on observed failure

theory.natural_language: Audit finding: unauthorized production access occurred. Common causes include missing MFA, shared admin accounts, or lack of network isolation. System Omega uses shared admin accounts. System Omega has MFA. System Omega lacks network isolation.

queries.natural_language: What is the most plausible cause of the unauthorized access on System Omega?

expected_answer.natural_language: The lack of network isolation is the likely cause, since MFA exists and shared accounts remain.

queries.natural_language: Is missing MFA a good hypothesis here?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. System Omega has MFA, so that hypothesis is weak.

queries.natural_language: Could shared admin accounts be part of the cause?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Shared admin accounts are a listed possible cause and are present on Omega.
expected_answer.explanation: unauthorized_access POSSIBLE_CAUSE shared_admin_accounts ∧ SystemOmega USES shared_admin_accounts
